New Records: KL Rahul scored 97 not out, the highest score in the match
Ravindra Jadeja took 3 wickets for 28 runs
Australia scored 199, their total in the innings
Steve Smith was dismissed by Ravindra Jadeja, a turning point in the match
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja's dismissal of Steve Smith was a pivotal moment
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli formed a crucial partnership to chase down the target
India's lowest score at the fall of the third wicket (2/3) was a significant achievement
Pre-Game Insights: Australia elected to bat first after winning the toss
India's fielding and bowling were highlighted as key strengths
Players and analysts discussed the challenging pitch conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's effort and fielding
Pat Cummins acknowledged the difficulty of chasing the target
KL Rahul was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai
The low score at the fall of the third wicket (2/3) was noted as a historical achievement
The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24 series
Others: The match was a topsy-turvy ODI that India won by 6 wickets
The crowd's support was mentioned as a positive factor
